title: Black women feel sting of 'traumatizing' Jackson hearings - The Associated Press - en Español
content:
1. Black women feel sting of 'traumatizing' Jackson hearings  The Associated Press - en Español
  2. Mitch McConnell’s Confederate Flag Photo Resurfaces as He Announces He Will Oppose Ketanji Brown Jackson’s Supreme Court Confirmation  Yahoo News
  3. Senate confirmation hearing antics 'outrageous and beyond the pale,' Booker says  POLITICO
  4. Editorial: Ketanji Brown Jackson’s unflappable brilliance seals the deal. Confirm her swiftly  Los Angeles Times
  5. Republicans at Judge Jackson's hearing feigned concern over dark money  NBC News
description: NEW YORK (AP) — “Senator,” she said, letting out an audible sigh. In that singular moment, Supreme Court  nominee Ketanji Brown Jackson  spoke for countless Black women who have had to gather all the patience, strength and grace within to answer insinuating questions about their credentials, qualifications and character.
